SEARCH
Module com.example.dicegame
Package controllers

Class StoryScreenController

java.lang.Object
controllers.StoryScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class StoryScreenController extends Object implements Controller
Controller class for the story screen in the game. Handles the interaction with the player, including character selection, bet management, and transitioning to the game scene.
